Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrier, Player, Projectile, TankForcefield, Turret

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
